text: hello! I have a HubDB table "Categories" which has a column "language". We support english and german. I have setup one dynamic page using this table as a datasource for each language but there is no way to filter the table rows as a result I now have <https://www.witty.works/en/categories/openly_discriminating> and <https://www.witty.works/en/categories/offene_diskriminierung> but the later should only be visible under <https://www.witty.works/de/kategorien/offene_diskriminierung>

Hi guys, I’m attempting to show a contact’s firstname in a navigation menu when logged in. I know that using data from the CRM objects is restricted to pages that require a password or a membership login, BUT, has anyone found a workaround for using such data on public pages too?  Thanks!
